response.summary:
Mechatronic Engineer with experience in automation projects, robotics, AI, control, and software development. During the last year I´ve been working on several projects including software development (C++, Python, ROS; Linux), Neural Network models, LIDAR sensors and communications.
I'm interested in working on Research and Development projects, where I could integrate hardware components (sensors, actuators) with software that includes AI technologies.
I consider myself responsible, transparent and engaged in my work. I have good performance in interdisciplinary work teams, project's organization and execution, verbal and written communication. I always have been recognized for the commitment and quality of my work.
response.skills: Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Robótica, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Responsabilidad, Programación, Ingeniería, Microcontroladores, Método de los elementos finitos, Visión artificial, Matlab, C, Arduino, LaTeX, Simulink, Controlador lógico programable, C++, Trabajo en equipo, RAPID, ROS

profile_positions.description:
Research of new markets in the area of industrial automation. Design, development, and implementation of new products and/or services, relevant in the market and financially profitable.
- Design of mechanical, electronic and communication systems.
- Software development (C ++, Python) on the ROS framework.
- Integration of LIDAR-type technologies in Deep Learning prediction systems.
- Planning and execution of Research and Development projects.
- Teamwork with the interdisciplinary innovation group.
- Contact with suppliers and technical support staff, locally and internationally.
profile_positions.title: Research, Development and Innovation Engineer

profile_positions.description: Personalized classes: math, physics and engineering.
profile_positions.title: Private Tutor

company.name: Kiwibot
company.description: If you wish for it, we deliver it  🌎 🥝
